title: Skins 4 Yorick
body:
In my last board i talked about Annie skins. I got told in the comments that she has two many skins and when i think about it yeah she does. So I've decided to put together a bunch of Yorick skins Ive found.

- Crazy Cat Lady Yorick, ( i do have a link to it so check it out ) this is a skin that is a pretty smart idea, now the ghouls are 3 different types of cats with glowing eyes. instead of holding a shovel he is holding a large litterbox scoop and instead of having a lantern , he has a cat toy dangling above his head with a little light attached to it. 

- Gentleman yorick

- Construction Yorick, This skin is pretty cool, you have a regular shovel, except he's wearing a safety helmet and a bright orange and yellow vest with a red shirt underneath , white gloves and a little construction light dangling above his head. One of his ghouls is a construction truck, another a bulldozer and the third a digger

and there you go thats all I've got for now peace out

P.S This was quite rushed

replies.body: Wait someone actually listened to me and improved on my feedback? Am I on the right forums?

You realize he doesn't even have most of the things your describing including different ghouls from his old kit.

Lazy post.

Crazy Cat Lady Yorick FTW! Rito pls it's been 5 years...
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
